cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jibika

sentence.kanji: 今、耳鼻科にかかっています。
sentence.romaji: ima jibika ni kakate imasu
sentence.english: I go to an ENT specialist now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gunshuu

sentence.kanji: 数百人の群集が集まっているの。
sentence.romaji: suuhyakunin no gunshuu ga atsumate iru no
sentence.english: A crowd of hundreds has assembled.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mure

sentence.kanji: 湖に鳥の群れがいたよ。
sentence.romaji: mizuumi ni tori no mure ga ita yo
sentence.english: There was a flock of birds on the lake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kimi

sentence.kanji: この本を君にあげます。
sentence.romaji: kono hon wo kimi ni agemasu
sentence.english: I'm going to give you this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikiyougu

sentence.kanji: 今日は筆記用具を忘れました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hikiyougu wo wasuremashita
sentence.english: I forgot my writing materials today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanyouku

sentence.kanji: 「手が空く」は慣用句です。
sentence.romaji: te ga suku ha kanyouku desu
sentence.english: I have my hands free is an idiom.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shounika

sentence.kanji: 子供を小児科に連れて行くところです。
sentence.romaji: kodomo wo shounika ni tsurete iku tokoro desu
sentence.english: I'm about to take my kid to the pediatrician.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoute

sentence.kanji: 彼は両手を握り締めたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ryoute wo nigirishimeta no
sentence.english: He clenched his fists.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setsubi

sentence.kanji: この研究所には最新の設備が揃っています。
sentence.romaji: kono kenkyuujo ni ha saishin no setsubi ga sorote imasu
sentence.english: This laboratory has the latest equipment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukin

sentence.kanji: 事件現場付近で怪しい人物を見た。
sentence.romaji: jiken genba fukin de ayashii jinbutsu wo mita
sentence.english: A suspicious person was seen in the vicinity of the crime scene.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teate

sentence.kanji: 彼女は急いで怪我の手当てをしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha isoide kega no teate wo shita yo
sentence.english: She quickly administered first aid treatment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manga

sentence.kanji: 妹は漫画が好きです。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha manga ga suki desu
sentence.english: My little sister likes manga.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odayaka

sentence.kanji: 彼らは穏やかな暮らしをしているの。
sentence.romaji: karera ha odayaka na kurashi wo shite i no
sentence.english: They live a quiet life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikagoro

sentence.kanji: 近頃、彼女の様子がおかしい。
sentence.romaji: chikagoro kanojo no yousu ga okashii
sentence.english: She's been behaving strangely these days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiji

sentence.kanji: 刑事が現場を調べているわ。
sentence.romaji: keiji ga genba wo shirabete iru wa
sentence.english: The detective is investigating the crime scene.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seisaku

sentence.kanji: この映画は香港で製作されました。
sentence.romaji: kono eiga ha honkon de seisaku saremashita
sentence.english: This movie was produced in Hong Kong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tosho

sentence.kanji: これは児童図書です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha jidoutosho desu
sentence.english: This is a children's book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inoru

sentence.kanji: 皆が人質の無事を祈っているわよ。
sentence.romaji: minna ga hitojichi no buji wo inote iru wa yo
sentence.english: Everyone is praying for the hostage's safety.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tetsugaku

sentence.kanji: 哲学は興味深い学問です。
sentence.romaji: tetsugaku ha kyoumibukai gakumon desu
sentence.english: Philosophy is an interesting field of study.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aizu

sentence.kanji: 車掌が発車の合図をしたよ。
sentence.romaji: shashou ga hasha no aizu wo shita yo
sentence.english: The conductor gave the signal to depart.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikau

sentence.kanji: 二人は一生を共にすることを誓ったの。
sentence.romaji: futari ha ishou wo tomoni suru koto wo chikata no
sentence.english: The couple swore to be together for a lifetime.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kogu

sentence.kanji: 彼らは交代でボートを漕いだんだ。
sentence.romaji: karera ha koutai de bo-to wo koida n da
sentence.english: They took turns rowing the boat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inori

sentence.kanji: その日、国民は平和への祈りを捧げるの。
sentence.romaji: sono hi kokumin ha heiwa he no inori wo sasageru　no
sentence.english: The people pray for peace on that day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katsu

sentence.kanji: 今日はヤンキースが勝った。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha yanki-su ga kata
sentence.english: The Yankees won today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ipai

sentence.kanji: プールは人で一杯です。
sentence.romaji: pu-ru ha hito de ipai desu
sentence.english: The pool is packed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katakana

sentence.kanji: お名前を片仮名で書いてください。
sentence.romaji: onamae wo katakana de kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your name in katakana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hantoshi

sentence.kanji: 日本に来て半年になります。
sentence.romaji: nipon ni kite hantoshi ni narimasu
sentence.english: It has been half a year since I came to Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hantsuki

sentence.kanji: 半月前に日本に来ました。
sentence.romaji: hantsukimae ni nihon ni kimashita
sentence.english: I came to Japan half a month ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hannichi

sentence.kanji: 今日は半日だけ仕事だ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hannichi dake shigoto da
sentence.english: I'm working only a half-day today.

cards.english: how many degrees, how many times
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nando

sentence.kanji: あの店には何度も行きました。
sentence.romaji: ano mise ni ha nando mo ikimashita
sentence.english: I've been to that shop many times.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuben

sentence.kanji: 私の家は駅から遠くて不便です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ie ha eki kara tooku te fuben desu
sentence.english: My house is inconveniently located far from the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuujouken

sentence.kanji: 入場券は3000円です。
sentence.romaji: nyuujouken ha sanzenen desu
sentence.english: The admission ticket is 3,000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seki

sentence.kanji: この席、空いてますか。
sentence.romaji: kono seki aitemasu ka
sentence.english: Is this seat free?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seido

sentence.kanji: 来年から新しい制度が始まります。
sentence.romaji: rainen kara atarashii seido ga hajimarimasu
sentence.english: A new system will start from next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nendo

sentence.kanji: 売り上げは年度によって違います。
sentence.romaji: uriage ha nendo ni yote chigaimasu
sentence.english: Sales differ by fiscal year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kariru

sentence.kanji: 彼にビデオを借りました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni bideo wo karimashita
sentence.english: I borrowed a video from him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's watasu

sentence.kanji: 彼に手紙を渡しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni tegami wo watashimashita
sentence.english: I handed him the letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuseki

sentence.kanji: 午後は会議に出席します。
sentence.romaji: gogo ha kaigi ni shuseki shimasu
sentence.english: I'll attend a meeting in the afternoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wataru

sentence.kanji: 私たちは歩いて橋を渡った。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha aruite hashi wo watata
sentence.english: We walked over the bridge.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's handan

sentence.kanji: 彼の判断は正しい。
sentence.romaji: kare no handan ha tadashii
sentence.english: His judgment is correct.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katamichi

sentence.kanji: 東京まで片道切符を買った。
sentence.romaji: toukyou made katamichi kipu wo kata
sentence.english: I bought a one-way ticket to Tokyo.

cards.english: put in order, dispose of, do away with
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katazukeru

sentence.kanji: 早く部屋を片付けなさい。
sentence.romaji: hayaku heya wo katazukenasai
sentence.english: Hurry up and clean up your room.

cards.english: be put in order, be settled
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katazuku

sentence.kanji: 仕事が大分片付いた。
sentence.romaji: shigoto ga daibu katazuita
sentence.english: I've completed a lot of my work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's binbou

sentence.kanji: 彼は昔は貧乏だった。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mukashi ha binbou data
sentence.english: He used to be poor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakeru

sentence.kanji: 肉が焼けました。
sentence.romaji: niku ga yakemashita
sentence.english: The meat is cooked.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukiyaki

sentence.kanji: 昨日の夜はすき焼きを食べた。
sentence.romaji: kinou no yoru ha sukiyaki wo tabeta
sentence.english: I had sukiyaki last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaku

sentence.kanji: 今、魚を焼いています。
sentence.romaji: ima sakana wo yaite imasu
sentence.english: I'm grilling fish now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanpai

sentence.kanji: お二人の未来に乾杯しましょう。
sentence.romaji: ofutari no mirai ni kanpai shimashou
sentence.english: Let's drink a toast to the couple's future.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanbun

sentence.kanji: お菓子を友達に半分あげた。
sentence.romaji: okashi wo tomodachi ni hanbun ageta
sentence.english: I gave half the sweets to a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hihan

sentence.kanji: 彼は同僚を批判した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha douryou wo hihan shita
sentence.english: He criticized his colleague.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teido

sentence.kanji: この程度の怪我なら大丈夫です。
sentence.romaji: kono teido no kega nara daijoubu desu
sentence.english: With an injury of this small extent, she's going to be fine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sanpo

sentence.kanji: 私のお祖父さんは毎日散歩します。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ojiisan ha mainichi sanpo shimasu 。
sentence.english: My grandfather takes a walk every day.
